I RECOMMEND THIS COURSE 
============
1. course covers  MVC app build on n-tier architecture MVC 
2. course include Javascripts snippet 
3. course include building charts in Javascrpt and putting it on webpage (which I was looking for)
4. unfortunately Thiego has not very good English pronouncation so you have to watch very carefully

I RECOMMEND THIS COURSE
============
1. course covers MVC app build on n-tier architecture MVC
2. course include Javascripts snippet
3. course include building charts in Javascrpt and putting it on webpage (which I was looking for)
4. unfortunately Thiego has not very good English pronouncation so you have to watch very carefully
